dublin_core.dcvalue: Personal digital assistants PDAs have taken an increasing role in the practice of otolaryngology PDAs provide an extension of the resources available on the user s PC Handheld devices currently are being used for e prescribing charge capture and accessing daily schedules and reference tools Future applications may include education on medications dictation order entry and test results reporting These applications of PDAs in the practice of otolaryngology will be reviewed
Current opinion in otolaryngology And head and neck surgery
Using hand-held computing devices in the practice of otolaryngology-head and neck surgery.
